alert.note: Alert for Eastern Schenectady; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Saratoga; Northern Washington; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 3:33AM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. The highest totals will be over the southwest Adirondacks, extreme northwest Saratoga County and portions of Washington County. * WHERE...The southwest Adirondacks excluding Hamilton and Warren Counties, the Mohawk Valley, the northern portions of the Capital Region including the Saratoga area, and Washington County. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads and reduced vsibilities in the snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will approach an inch an hour late this afternoon into the early evening. Sleet may mix in at times late this afternoon into early this evening across the Mohawk Valley and northern portions of the Capital Region, including central and southern Saratoga County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
